thread.title: Designer pulls ad-blocking app to protect publishers
thread.title_full: Designer pulls ad-blocking app to protect publishers

title: Designer pulls ad-blocking app to protect publishers
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Designer pulls ad-blocking app to protect publishers Ad-blockers have bcome increasingly popular Hero Images/Corbis James Dean Technology Correspondent Published at 12:01AM, September 21 2015 
An ad-blocking app that shot to the top of the download chart last week has been withdrawn after its designer said that it could hurt online publishers. 
Marco Arment said the success of his app, Peace, was “a massive achievement that should be the highlight of my professional career” but it “just doesn’t feel good”. He has offered to refund individuals who downloaded the app. 
Peace rose to number one on the App Store chart for paid apps after Apple updated iOS, its mobile operating system, to permit the use of antiadvertising software for the first time. Several ad-blockers made Subscribe now
